Module com.example.project4
Package com.example.project4

Class BuildYourOwn

java.lang.Object
com.example.project4.Pizza
com.example.project4.BuildYourOwn
All Implemented Interfaces:
Customizable
public class BuildYourOwn
extends Pizza
The BuidlYourOwn class extends the abstract Pizza class. This class is responsible for adding the user selected toppings and calculating the Build Your Own pizza prices based on size and toppings.
Author:
Serena Zeng, Jackson Lee
